downloadTitle: Installation and Upgrade Guide for Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015
downloadDescription: Download the installation and upgrade guide for Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015.
detailsSection: ​The Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015 Installation Guide assists you in creating a new Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015 application environment, as well as in upgrading an existing Microsoft Dynamics SL environment to release 2015. It also includes checklists and other aids to help make your installation a successful experience.This guide can be accessed from the main installation window. It can also be found in the Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015 download in the \DynamicsSL\Help folder.
